author: remm
msg: - Add some new fisrtReadTimeout modes (mostly for Mladen's testing):
- 0: poller will be used for all keepalives (this one was the behavior if fisrtReadTimeout <= 0),
and all the initial reads will have a short timeout
- -1: poller will be used for all keepalives, but all reads will use the regular socket timeout
- < -1: all reads will use the regular socket timeout; the mode becomes equivalent to -1 as soon
as more than maxThreads/2 are used
